review: this is a very expensive streamer. thats all it basically does. you have your amazon prime account that you add to it and then netflix which you have to pay for both. I'd rather get a playstation 3 or 4 which has both amazon and netflix but atleast i can play games and watch DVD/Blueray movies. easy installation and fun voice search feature that only works with amazon prime account options. If you are in netflix it doesnt work, it will only give you amazon choices. If you don't "sideload" apps to this thing you won't have much options except buying everything you want to watch for 2.99 or 3.99 here and there on amazon. as far as tv goes you can get ustvnow app which is sideloaded and not simple to get on there at all but once you do it has a monthly subscription as well for the good channels and for hd quality. overall not worth the money.  ill stick with my cable and my playstation.
